name.value: Nictiz Geboortezorg - Server - Scenario 1.2 - Serve Integrale Zwangerschapskaart resources of first pregnancy of Hanna Kooij - XML Format

description.value: Scenario 1.2: Serve Integrale Zwangerschapskaart resources of first pregnancy of Hanna Kooij
OAuth Token for current patient
Query Patient resource for HCIM Patient
Test XIS server to serve Patient resources.
Confirm that HTTP header Authorization contains the patient token ${patient-token-id}
Confirm that the operation was succesful
Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.
Confirm that the returned Bundle type is searchset.
Confirm that the returned Bundle total value matches or is less than the number of entries in the Bundle. The included resources should not be counted as entries in the Bundle.total.
Confirm that the returned Bundle contains a self link.
Confirm that the returned searchset Bundle contains 1 Patient resource(s).
